What is XLH?

X-linked hypophosphatemia (XLH) is characterized by chronic hypophosphatemia due to increased fibroblast growth factor 23 (FGF23) activity.1,10

DR. THOMAS CARPENTER — PROFESSOR OF ENDOCRINOLOGY AT YALE UNIVERSITY
